reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major lipid storage disorders: Gaucher disease (~1.5), Niemann-Pick disease (~0.7), Fabry disease (~0.45), gangliosidosis (~0.5), and other lysosomal lipidoses (~0.3) = ~2.5 per 100k. Low confidence due to heterogeneity, rarity, and significant ethnic/geographic variation.
